*******
z3hello
*******

A Zope 3 hello application for demonstarting
use of buildout and zc.zope3recipes for building
application soley from eggs.

Releases
********

==================
0.2   (2007/03/19)
==================

Use zc.zope3recipes:app recipe

==================
0.1   (2007/03/19)
==================

Initial release of Zope 3 hello app.
